query:
query getBeautyList($input: BeautyListInput, $businessType: String, $isNmap: Boolean!, $isBounds: Boolean!, $reverseGeocodingInput: ReverseGeocodingInput, $useReverseGeocode: Boolean = false) {
  businesses: nailshops(input: $input) {
    total
    userGender
    items {
      ...BeautyBusinessItems
      imageMarker @include(if: $isNmap) {
        marker
        markerSelected
        __typename
      }
      markerId @include(if: $isNmap)
      markerLabel @include(if: $isNmap) {
        text
        style
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    nlu {
      ...NluFields
      __typename
    }
    optionsForMap @include(if: $isBounds) {
      ...OptionsForMap
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  brands: beautyBrands(input: $input, businessType: $businessType) {
    name
    cid
    __typename
  }
  reverseGeocodingAddr(input: $reverseGeocodingInput) @include(if: $useReverseGeocode) {
    ...ReverseGeocodingAddr
    __typename
  }
}

fragment NluFields on Nlu {
  queryType
  user {
    gender
    __typename
  }
  queryResult {
    ptn0
    ptn1
    region
    spot
    tradeName
    service
    selectedRegion {
      name
      index
      x
      y
      __typename
    }
    selectedRegionIndex
    otherRegions {
      name
      index
      __typename
    }
    property
    keyword
    queryType
    nluQuery
    businessType
    cid
    branch
    forYou
    franchise
    titleKeyword
    location {
      x
      y
      default
      longitude
      latitude
      dong
      si
      __typename
    }
    noRegionQuery
    priority
    showLocationBarFlag
    themeId
    filterBooking
    repRegion
    repSpot
    dbQuery {
      isDefault
      name
      type
      getType
      useFilter
      hasComponents
      __typename
    }
    type
    category
    menu
    context
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment ReverseGeocodingAddr on ReverseGeocodingResult {
  rcode
  region
  __typename
}

fragment OptionsForMap on OptionsForMap {
  maxZoom
  minZoom
  includeMyLocation
  maxIncludePoiCount
  center
  spotId
  keepMapBounds
  __typename
}

fragment CouponItems on Coupon {
  total
  promotions {
    promotionSeq
    couponSeq
    conditionType
    image {
      url
      __typename
    }
    title
    description
    type
    couponUseType
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment BeautyBusinessItemBase on BeautySummary {
  id
  apolloCacheId
  name
  hasBooking
  hasNPay
  blogCafeReviewCount
  bookingReviewCount
  bookingReviewScore
  description
  roadAddress
  address
  imageUrl
  talktalkUrl
  distance
  x
  y
  representativePrice {
    isFiltered
    priceName
    price
    __typename
  }
  promotionTitle
  stylesCount
  visitorReviewCount
  visitorReviewScore
  styleBookingCounts {
    styleNum
    name
    count
    isPopular
    __typename
  }
  newOpening
  coupon {
    ...CouponItems
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment BeautyBusinessItems on BeautySummary {
  ...BeautyBusinessItemBase
  styles {
    desc
    shortDesc
    styleNum
    isPopular
    images {
      imageUrl
      __typename
    }
    styleOptions {
      num
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  streetPanorama {
    id
    pan
    tilt
    lat
    lon
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

query getBeautyAdBusinessList($input: BeautyAdBusinessesInput, $isNmap: Boolean!) {
  beautyAdBusinesses(input: $input) {
    total
    bucket
    bucketTest
    ... on BeautyAdsResult {
      items {
        ...BeautyAdItemFields
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment BeautyAdItemFields on BeautyAdSummary {
  adId
  adClickLog {
    clickUrl
    smartOrderClickUrl
    trackingParameters {
      n_ad_group_type
      n_query
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  impressionEventUrl
  effectiveImpressionEventUrl
  adDescription
  id
  dbType
  name
  businessCategory
  category
  categoryCodeList
  description
  hasBooking
  hasNPay
  x
  y
  distance
  imageUrl
  imageCount
  phone
  virtualPhone
  routeUrl
  streetPanorama {
    id
    pan
    tilt
    lat
    lon
    __typename
  }
  roadAddress
  address
  commonAddress
  blogCafeReviewCount
  bookingReviewCount
  totalReviewCount
  bookingUrl
  bookingBusinessId
  talktalkUrl
  detailCid {
    c0
    c1
    c2
    c3
    __typename
  }
  options
  promotionTitle
  agencyId
  businessHours
  markerId @include(if: $isNmap)
  markerLabel @include(if: $isNmap) {
    text
    style
    __typename
  }
  imageMarker @include(if: $isNmap) {
    marker
    markerSelected
    __typename
  }
  newBusinessHours {
    status
    description
    dayOff
    dayOffDescription
    __typename
  }
  coupon {
    total
    promotions {
      promotionSeq
      couponSeq
      conditionType
      image {
        url
        __typename
      }
      title
      description
      type
      couponUseType
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  hasMobilePhoneNumber
  bookingReviewScore
  visitorReviewCount
  visitorReviewScore
  representativePrice {
    isFiltered
    priceName
    price
    __typename
  }
  stylesCount
  styles {
    isPopular
    desc
    shortDesc
    styleNum
    images {
      imageUrl
      __typename
    }
    styleOptions {
      num
      __typename
    }
    beautyStyleExtentionClickUrl
    __typename
  }
  styleBookingCounts {
    styleNum
    name
    count
    isPopular
    __typename
  }
  newOpening
  __typename
}
